programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.sub-title: Mom: Let Us Speak to Our Dying Dad!
programme.desc: Four adult siblings say they have been blacklisted by their mother from seeing their dying father.

programme.title: Dr.Phil
programme.sub-title: Get Out of My Family Tree!
programme.desc: A Mother-in-Law who spies on her son and 2 sisters fighting over the family will!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Danielle says that her husband of nearly 10 years, John, has been living a secret life -- reaching out to men on Craigslist for sex and looking at child pornography. John insists that the child porn was accidentally downloaded, and while he admits to exchanging emails with men online, he maintains that he never met up with anyone in person. How does he explain his actions? And, what will the results of a polygraph test reveal?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Did 21 yo Erin Caffey plot to have her family killed, or was she the victim of puppy love gone terribly wrong? In a Dr Phil Exclusive, she speaks out from prison about the brutal killing.

programme.title: Dr.Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues his exclusive interview with Erin Caffey, who was sentenced to two life sentences in prison plus 25 years for the murders of her mother and two little brothers in 2008. What does she say was her role in the brutal slayings? And, Erin’s father, Terry, says he has forgiven his daughter -- will her revelations to Dr. Phil cause him to have a change of heart?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: A woman says her husband has falsely accused her of infidelity.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Who will Brad choose: his wife or girlfriend?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Who will Brad choose: his wife or girlfriend?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: The intervention continues with a cheating husband.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Guests claim their pregnancies have lasted well over 9 months– Shayna for one year and Zona for more than three-and-a-half years.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.sub-title: My Ex Is Slowly Killing Our Child
programme.desc: A woman says her ex-husband enables their daughter's addiction.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: A family is on the verge of imploding as their holiday arguments turn violent.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.sub-title: Revenge: The Good, The Bad, The Ugly
programme.desc: Headline-making revenge stories are examined.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Statistics show that 2,000 teens get pregnant every day. Moms and dads: Watch this show with your teenagers, because it can impact their lives and yours! Two families face off over who should raise baby Miley. Paige, 17, and her boyfriend, Jordan, 18, are determined to raise their child on their own, even though they live with Jordan’s dad, Chris. Nikki, Paige’s stepmom, thinks she and her husband should raise the child, because they can better provide for her, and she wants Paige to break up with Jordan. Why does she believe that Jordan is brainwashing Paige? The teen dad says Nikki is the one who’s controlling, and he’s stepped up to the plate. Will the families come to an agreement? See what Dr. Phil tells them they must do to ensure Miley grows up in a healthy environment. Plus, find out the 10 things teens want their parents to know about teen sex.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: 30 years after being forced into a religious sect full of sexual abuse, some of its victims share their stories for the first time.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.sub-title: Is My Sister a Drama Queen or Really Sick?
programme.desc: A woman believes her sister lied about being diagnosed with more than 70 health conditions.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: The conversation continues with a woman who says her sister lied about health diagnoses for attention.

programme.title: Dr.Phil
programme.desc: The intense behavior of mothers who constantly monitor their children is examined and put to the test.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.sub-title: My Ex Puts Fame Before Our Daughter
programme.desc: A couple is battling for custody of their 10-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.sub-title: Ex Falsely Accused Me of Poisoning
programme.desc: A heated custody battle discussion continues with accusations of abuse and sabotage.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.sub-title: Young, Privileged, And In A Gang
programme.desc: The family of a 16-year-old self-professed gang member comes together to urge the teen to turn his life around. And, two former gang members have an important message for the teen -- Is he ready to walk away from the gang life for good?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Children claim their mother wasted her inheritance.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Sara says her ex-husband, Mark, has brainwashed their three grown children against her, and she just wants to reclaim a place in their lives. Mark and his new wife, Mikel, say they’re afraid of Sara but are willing to face her onstage with Dr. Phil. Can these exes put the past behind them and make peace? And, is Sara’s 22-year-old daughter willing to fix their broken relationship?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Christian says he is stuck between two women fighting over him: his fiancée, Beth, and his mom, Carol. Beth says her future mother-in-law is meddling, constantly berates her and is trying to destroy her relationship -- and if she doesn’t butt out, Beth says she’ll be forced to end her relationship with Christian. How did the bad blood begin? Carol admits she doesn’t trust Beth and even hired a private investigator to spy on her. Why doesn’t she approve of Beth? And, what did the private investigator discover? Christian, who says he once had a great relationship with his mother, says he and Beth have canceled their wedding twice, in part due to his mother’s behavior. Is he prepared to choose between the two women in his life? And, will Carol ever accept Beth? Don’t miss Dr. Phil’s advice for this troubled family. Can they reach a resolution?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: A Meddling Mother-in-Law or a Lying Cheating Daughter-in-Law? Dr Phil delves into the family drama.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: A mother's concern escalates as her daughter's party lifestyle spirals into substance abuse and reckless behavior.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Bloody attacks, arrests, mug shots and undercover stings - Dr. Phil explores these extreme outcomes of in-law conflicts. Meet two wives whose rocky relationships with their in-laws led to criminal consequences.

programme.title: Dr.Phil
programme.sub-title: My Husband Thinks I'm Hacking Our House
programme.desc: Husband accuses his wife of hacking the family.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Is a wife really secretly hacking her own family?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: If you've got it, flaunt it! Dr. Phil's guests say they've gone from ugly ducklings to hot tamales, but their loved ones think they've gone too far.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil blows the whistle on what many parents are doing wrong. Find out if you're guilty of making the same mistakes.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.sub-title: Why Is My Mom Faking Cancer?
programme.desc: Jessica says her mother, Patricia, claims she is defying the odds by becoming a record-setting weight lifter while simultaneously battling Stage 3 brain cancer. But Jessica insists her mother isn’t sick at all and that she is lying about her health to gain sympathy and attention. She says Patricia has been spinning stories about various medical ailments for as long as she can remember -- and it’s time to come clean. Patricia strongly denies her daughter’s accusations and insists her diagnosis and incredible survival story are real. Why does she claim Jessica is out to get her? Emotions run high when mother and daughter meet on Dr. Phil’s stage. Do Patricia’s claims hold up? And, can this mother and daughter repair their fractured relationship?
